name: Wood Relief Raw Wood Conditioner
description:
Chicago Honey Co-op Wood Relief is a food safe conditioner for raw wood made of beeswax and walnut oil. 

Many raw wood conditioning products are made with food grade mineral oil which is a petroleum by-product. We chose walnut oil because it doesn't go rancid and compliments the beeswax.

We recommend applying with a soft clean cotton cloth. Scoop some onto the cloth and rub into the wood. Let sit for a bit and buff out. 

Use for cutting boards, wooden utensils and wooden knife handles.

Keep in mind that persons with allergies to tree nuts should not use this product.

name: Honey and Mustard Gift Basket
description: 12 oz jar of our honey combined with Honey Mustard, a pure Beeswax Votive and a Honey Dipper. Packaged in a reusable tray with real biodegradable cellophane.

name: Honey and Body Care Gift Set
description:
A 6 oz jar of our Honey along with our Honey Sugar Scrub, solid lotion Body Bar,  beeswax Lip Balm and a pure beeswax votive candle. Packaged in a reusable container with biodegradable real cellophane wrapping topped off with a bow and wooden honey dipper.

A perfect gift for any occasion.

name: Honey and Honey Mustard Gift Set
description:
A 6oz. jar of our honey and a 4oz. jar of our very own honey mustard are boxed and paired together with ribbon. The set makes a perfect hostess gift for the season. Or just keep it for yourself.

If you are looking for gift ideas or need to make a gift basket, this item comes gift boxed. We are happy to include your personalized note at no extra charge.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

options.name: Honey and Honey Mustard Gift Set

name: Pressed Glass Votive Holder
description:
This charming pressed glass votive holder comes with a pure beeswax tealight and can serve double duty as a small flower vase.

This votive holder can be gift boxed and would be wonderful choice for wedding decoration.

Approximately 3.25 inches in diameter and 3.5 inches tall

name: Bath and Body Gift Package
description:
Our  Bath and Body Gift Package is  a combination of our luscious 10 oz Honey Sugar Body Scrub and Body Moisturizer Bar combined in a sparkling organza bag. A complex blend of essential oils combined with our own raw honey, sugar crystals and jojoba oil make up the Honey Sugar Body Scrub. The body bar is a solid body moisturizer made with our own beeswax, cocoa butter, palm oil and sweet almond oil. 

A gift idea perfect for Holidays, birthdays or bridal showers.
This item is gift packaged. Select the "send it for me option and we will ship for you and include your personalized note at no extra charge.



Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

options.name: Send It for Me Body Care

name: Honey Mustard
description:
We worked for awhile on this mustard recipe. We tried it out at the farmers market over the Summer and it did very well. We make it with organic mustard seed, white wine vinegar, honey, onions, garlic, olive oil, salt and a little cayenne pepper. It's not too sweet but well balanced and tasty! 4oz.

If you are looking for gift ideas or need to make a gift basket, this item is available in a gift box. Select the gift box option when you add to your cart. We are happy to include your personalized note at no extra charge.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: Honey 1lb
description:
Raw honey, unheated and chemical free.
Our bees gather nectar from white sweet clover and basswood in the spring and summer and in the fall they get nectar from wild aster and goldenrod. In addition, there are abundant sources of nectar from the flowers planted in Chicago's famous city parks. The variety of nectar sources gives our honey complex flavors that are unique to our city. You won't find honey like this in the supermarket.

The variety of nectar sources gives our honey complex flavors that are unique to our city . You won't find honey like this in the supermarket.

name: Scented Body Bar
description:
This is the scented version of our solid moisturizer bar. We use the beeswax cappings we get when we extract honey as the main ingredient. We melt that with organic vegetable shortening, organic sweet almond oil and organic cocoa butter.

The same essential oils we use in our Honey Scrub are used in this solid lotion bar. People really do go “ooohh” when they smell it
We cut it into circles with a biscuit cutter which is why the edges are a little rough.

Soft and buttery,it’s great for dry skin. 2.25 oz.

Gift Box option available.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: Moisturizing Body Bar
description:
This is our solid body moisturizer bar. We use the beeswax cappings we get when we extract honey as the main ingredient. We melt that with organic vegetable shortening, organic sweet almond oil and organic cocoa butter. 
We cut it into circles with a biscuit cutter which is why the edges are a little rough. We can also gift box it for you on request.
Unscented
It's great for dry skin. 2.25 oz.

Gift box option available.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: Honey Bath Scrub 8oz.
description:
If you are looking for a body scrub, our Honey Sugar Scrub is a wonderful exfoliator and body moisturizer. It has the refreshing scent of citrus with a minty undertone. 


People say "oooooh smell this" when they smell it.

Use it in the shower or bath. We make it with our own raw honey, sugar crystals, almond oil, apricot kernel oil, jojoba oil, royal jelly, arnica, evening primrose oil and essential oils of : grapefruit, lemon, calendula, peppermint, lemongrass, vanilla, sweet orange, bergamot, lime and tangerine.
In a 10 oz. jar. Yum!

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: Beeswax Lip Balm 4 Pack
description:
This beeswax lip balm is a favorite of our customers. We make it with our own beeswax. It isn’t like any other I’ve ever tried. No flavor added! Ingredients are chemical free beeswax, organic vegetable shortening, organic sweet almond oil and organic cocoa butter. Sold in groups of 4.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: Honey Bees and Beekeeping  - A year in the Life of an Apiary
description: Learn how to set up and maintain your own honey bee colony from Keith Delaplane, Ph.D., of The University of Georgia. The book is a step by step guide to beekeeping.

name: Handbook for Natural Beekeeping
description:
This Handbook is based on Certified Naturally Grown’s apiary
certification standards, which place the primary focus on the
health of honey bees and the sustainability of beekeeping, and
a secondary focus on agricultural products of the hive (honey,
pollen, and propolis). The second edition reflects the latest
version of CNG standards as of October 2012.
This booklet is intended to be a handy resource for natural
beekeepers. It serves as a guide to best practices (the
Recommended and Required sub-headings), while
accommodating a range of reasonable choices (Permitted) and
steering readers away from bad practices (Prohibited).

name: Ribbed Round Beeswax Candle
description: This cute ribbed round candle is 2 inches high and 2.75 inches in diameter.  Can burn as long as 12 hours depending on conditions. Pure beeswax with a cotton wick. Can be gift boxed. Every batch of beeswax is a little different so color may vary from that in photo.

name: 4 Votive Set
description:
Four 2 inch tall, pure beeswax votive candles in a kraft paper package. We don’t add scents to any of our candles. We just let the natural, subtle honey scent speak for itself. 

This item comes in a gift box.  We are happy to include your personalized note at no extra charge.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: Pure Beeswax Honeybee Candle
description: Our Honeybee candle is 4 inches wide from wing tip to wing tip and about 3 1/4 inches from head to tail.  It would make a fine accent to any table. Please be advised that figural candles may not burn evenly.

name: Round Fluted Beeswax Candle
description: Made of pure beeswax this fluted round candle is about 3 inches tall and 2 1/2 inches in diameter. It casts a lovely shadow when it burns.

name: Mini Alphabet Votive Candles
description:
Spell out your message with these pure beeswax alphabet block votive candles. Great for Holidays, birthdays, baby showers, hostess gifts or just for fun. 
Votives measure approximately 11/8" square and have letters on two sides. Letter combinations are: A/O, B/N, C/M, D/R, E/Q, F/P, G/U, H/T, I/M, J/X, K/W, L/V, S/I, N/Z and Y/O. Letter combinations on individual candles cannot be changed. You have the option to choose up to 8 blocks.
Made of pure beeswax. Because every batch of beeswax is different, actual color may not match that it the picture.
Please indicate which letter combinations you want in your message to seller.

name: Beeswax Christmas Partridge Candle
description:
Perfect for the Holidays, this lovely little partridge is made of pure beeswax. She is a little over 3" tall and weighs nearly 4 oz. If you decide to burn her, the natural scent of beeswax will be all you smell.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: Partridge Family Beeswax Candles
description:
A charming addition to your decor, this mama partridge and 3 partridge chicks are made of pure beeswax. She is a little over 3" tall and weighs nearly 4 oz. The chicks are 2.75 inches and 1.7 ounces.

If you decide to burn them, the natural scent of beeswax will be all you smell.

name: Four Little Gift Boxed Votives
description:
Four of our popular beeswax wedding/holiday votives in a kraft gift box. These would be a perfect wedding favor, hostess gift or anytime gift.

Made of pure beeswax, these votives will burn for approximately 5 to 7 hours depending on conditions. They are 1.25 inches in diameter and about 1.25 inches tall.
Please be aware that every batch of beeswax has a different color so the color of your candles may not match those in the picture.

name: Beeswax Candle Partridge Chick
description: This little partridge chick is made of pure beeswax with a cotton wick.  She is a little over 2.75" tall and weighs about 1.7 oz.  If you decide to burn her, the natural scent of beeswax will be all you smell.  Please note the color of your candle may not match that in the picture. Figural candles may not burn evenly.

name: Beeswax TeaLights - Box of 8
description:
Eight long burning tea lights in a kraft paper gift box. Beeswax burns up to five times longer than paraffin candles and is a renewable resource. Please keep in mind that the color of your candles may not match that in the picture. 
This is a great hostess gift for any occasion.

name: Honeybee Beeswax Pillar Candle
description:
2 7/8 inch diameter and 2 1/4 inches high, this pillar candle has honeybees decorating it's sides. Beeswax burns brighter and longer than paraffin candles and even removes impurities from the air. 8 oz in weight, this candle should burn for approximately 45 hours. Sorry, the little plate is not included. 

This item is available in a gift box. Select the gift box option when you add to your cart. We also ship for you and include your personalized note at no extra charge.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.

name: 12 Little Beeswax Wedding Votives
description:
If you already have votive holders, these pure beeswax votive candles will fill them up quite nicely. Although they are small, they will burn 5 times longer than their paraffin counterparts. Besides that, you have the satisfaction of knowing they are an eco-friendly renewable resource. Made by bees. Package of 12.
Lovely white dish not included.

Click the "Back to Site" button to find out more about us.
